summary: The Chipmunks compete with the Chipettes in a round the world race.
cast: Ross Bagdasarian Jr.|Janice Karman|Dody Goodman|Susan Tyrrell|Anthony De Longis|Frank Welker|Nancy Cartwright|Philip L. Clarke|Ken Sansom|George Poulos|Charlie Adler|Patrick Pinney|Jack Angel|Mel Blanc|Laura Summer
title: La vuelta al mundo de Alvin y las ardillas
